mapper.select:
select a.*,(case a.activity_type when 1 then (select leads_name from `wk_crm_leads` where leads_id = a.activity_type_id) when 2 then (select customer_name from `wk_crm_customer` where customer_id = a.activity_type_id) when 3 then (select name from `wk_crm_contacts` where contacts_id = a.activity_type_id) when 5 then (select business_name from `wk_crm_business` where business_id = a.activity_type_id) when 6 then (select name from `wk_crm_contract` where contract_id = a.activity_type_id) when 7 then (select number from `wk_crm_receivables` where receivables_id = a.activity_type_id) end ) as activityTypeName from `wk_crm_activity` as a where date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{time} and a.status = 1
and date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
and a.content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
and a.type != 1
order by a.create_time desc

select a.*,(case a.activity_type when 2 then (select customer_name from `wk_crm_customer` where customer_id = a.activity_type_id) when 1 then (select leads_name from `wk_crm_leads` where leads_id = a.activity_type_id) when 5 then (select business_name from `wk_crm_business` where business_id = a.activity_type_id) when 6 then (select name from `wk_crm_contract` where contract_id = a.activity_type_id) when 3 then (select name from `wk_crm_contacts` where contacts_id = a.activity_type_id) end) as 'crmTypeName' from wk_crm_activity as a where activity_id = #{activityId}

select a.activity_id,a.type,a.create_time,a.content,a.category,a.next_time,a.batch_id,a.business_ids,a.contacts_ids,a.activity_type,a.activity_type_id,a.status, a.lng,a.lat,a.address,a.create_user_id, (case a.activity_type when 2 then (select customer_name from `wk_crm_customer` where customer_id = a.activity_type_id ) when 1 then (select leads_name from `wk_crm_leads` where leads_id = a.activity_type_id ) when 5 then (select business_name from `wk_crm_business` where business_id = a.activity_type_id ) when 6 then (select name from `wk_crm_contract` where contract_id = a.activity_type_id ) when 3 then (select name from `wk_crm_contacts` where contacts_id = a.activity_type_id ) end) as 'crmTypeName' from wk_crm_activity as a where a.create_user_id in
#{id}
and a.status = 1
and a.type = 1
and a.type = 4
and a.type in (1,4)
and a.activity_type = #{data.crmType}
and a.content like concat('%',#{data.search},'%')
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now())
AND to_days(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = 1
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) -1
AND date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
AND date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
AND QUARTER(a.create_time)=QUARTER(now())
AND QUARTER(a.create_time)=QUARTER(DATE_SUB(now(),interval 1 QUARTER))
AND YEAR(a.create_time)=YEAR(NOW())
AND YEAR(a.create_time)=YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{data.startTime}) and TO_DAYS(a.create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{data.endTime})
order by a.create_time desc
